it.polimi.se2019.model.cards

Class Deck<C extends Card>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.Deck<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - type of the elements of the deck, must be a Card.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivableDeck, AmmoDeck

    public abstract class Deck<C extends Card>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the abstract concept of a deck.
    Author:
    Desno365

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Create an instance of a deck.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addCard(C cardToAdd)
      Adds the specified card to the deck.
      void discardCard(C cardToDiscard)
      Adds the card to the discard deck.
      C drawCard()
      Returns the first card of the deck.
      protected abstract void initializeDeck()
      Should initialize the deck with all the cards.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if the deck doesn't contain any card.
      void refillDeck()
      Refills the deck by using the discard deck and then shuffles it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Create an instance of a deck. The deck is automatically initialized using the method initializeDeck().

    • Method Detail

      • drawCard

        public C drawCard()
        Returns the first card of the deck.
        Returns:
        the first card of the deck.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if the deck doesn't contain any card.
        Returns:
        true if the deck doesn't contain any card.

      • refillDeck

        public void refillDeck()
        Refills the deck by using the discard deck and then shuffles it.

      • discardCard

        public void discardCard(C cardToDiscard)
        Adds the card to the discard deck. The discard deck will be used when refilling the deck with the method refillDeck().
        Parameters:
        cardToDiscard - the card to discard.

      • addCard

        protected void addCard(C cardToAdd)
        Adds the specified card to the deck. This method is protected because only at initialization cards are added.
        Parameters:
        cardToAdd - the card to add to the deck.

      • initializeDeck

        protected abstract void initializeDeck()
        Should initialize the deck with all the cards.
